statements: UPDATE AccessibilityInARApplications SET accessibility_features = '{"voice_commands": true, "high_contrast_mode": true}' WHERE application_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE AccessibilityInARApplications SET user_demographics = '{"age": 35, "gender": "female"}' WHERE application_id = '98765432-aaaa-bbbb-cccc-123456789abc';

UPDATE AccessibilityInARApplications SET user_demographics = '{"age": 25, "gender": "male"}', accessibility_features = '{"text_size": "large", "color_scheme": "dark"} WHERE application_id = '123e4567-e12b-12c1-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE AccessibilityInARApplications SET accessibility_features = '{"text_size": "small", "color_scheme": "light"}', user_demographics = '{"age": 30, "gender": "female"}' WHERE application_id = '987e6543-c21b-34d2-b321-098765432100';
UPDATE users SET age = 30, gender = 'Female' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE demographics SET income = 75000.50, race = 'Asian', education_level = 'Bachelor' WHERE demographic_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-cdef-123456789abc';
